Title: Dawn of the Peck
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: While Bob is boycotting the holiday, Linda and the kids spend Thanksgiving at the First Annual Fischoeder Turk-tacular Turkey Town Festival. However, a wild bird attack leads to total mayhem.
